mapper.select: select cs.schedule_no AS scheduleNo ,cs.day AS day ,cs.period AS period ,cs.schedule_registered_date AS scheduleRegisteredDate ,co.course_name AS courseName ,sub.subject_name AS subjectName ,aro.room_number AS roomNumber ,aro.room_floor AS roomFloor ,aro.room_usage AS roomUsage ,tea.member_id AS memberId ,mem.member_name AS memberName from course_schedule AS cs ,course_room_assignment AS cra ,course AS co ,subject AS sub ,academy_room AS aro ,teacher AS tea ,member_login AS login ,member AS mem where cs.course_assignment_no = cra.course_assignment_no and cra.course_no = co.course_no and co.subject_no = sub.subject_no and cra.room_no = aro.room_no and tea.course_no = co.course_no and tea.member_id = login.member_id and login.member_id = mem.member_id and login.member_level = '강사' order by cs.period asc
